articles.author: NATO
articles.title: Secretary General welcomes unprecedented rise in NATO defence spending - NATO HQ
articles.description: Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg released NATO's latest defence spending figures on Wednesday (14 February 2024), which show an unprecedented increase across European Allies and Canada.
articles.content:
Download the graph in pdf
Previewing this week's meetings of Defence Ministers, Mr Stoltenberg announced that since the Defence Investment Pledge was made in 2014, European Allies and Canada have ad… [+893 chars]
